fr.sii.ogham.sms.builder.cloudhopper

Class CharsetBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.AbstractParent<CloudhopperBuilder>
      • fr.sii.ogham.sms.builder.cloudhopper.CharsetBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.Builder<CloudhopperCharsetHandler>, fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.Parent<CloudhopperBuilder>

    public class CharsetBuilder
extends fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.AbstractParent<CloudhopperBuilder>
implements fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.Builder<CloudhopperCharsetHandler>
    Configures how Cloudhopper will handle charset encoding for SMS messages. Charsets defined by the SMPP protocol may be different from NIO charsets. This builder configures detection of the NIO charset defined by the SMS content handle by the Java application. This builder also configures how conversion from NIO charset to SMPP charset is handled.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Constructor Detail

      • CharsetBuilder

        public CharsetBuilder(CloudhopperBuilder parent,
                      fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.env.EnvironmentBuilder<?> environmentBuilder)
        Initializes the builder with a parent builder. The parent builder is used when calling AbstractParent.and() method. The EnvironmentBuilder is used to evaluate properties when build() method is called.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent builder
        environmentBuilder - the configuration for property resolution and evaluation

    • Method Detail

      • detector

        public fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.charset.CharsetDetectorBuilder<CharsetBuilder> detector()
        Configures NIO charset detection (see Charset). Charset detection is needed to detect the encoding of the SMS content used by the Java application. This encoding will then be used to be converted by a charset that is supported by the SMPP protocol.
        Returns:
        the builder to configure charset detection

      • convert

        public CharsetBuilder convert(String nioCharsetName,
                              String cloudhopperCharset)
        Registers a charset conversion. Conversion is required by Cloudhopper in order to use a charset supported by the SMPP protocol. You can register several charset conversions.
        Parameters:
        nioCharsetName - the charset used by the Java application
        cloudhopperCharset - the charset supported by the SMPP protocol
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining

      • build

        public CloudhopperCharsetHandler build()
        Specified by:
        build in interface fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.Builder<CloudhopperCharsetHandler>
